title: My league will not operate correctly on the macbook pro
body:
So currently, As I went to launch League, it said it needed to update, after that i would try to launch it again and again but it will say update. After several times of 'updating' it suddenly didn't allow me to really launch LOL. It would pop like a 1 sec > but it won't launch it or allow me to access it. I have restarted, uninstall many times. It won't work. Can someone give me all of the instructions to make it work again?

Thanks,
             WeabooHunterXD

replies.body:
It sounds like the admin settings might have been revoked or reset for some reason when you were updating. Try adjusting those admin rights again for your mac using [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9)! 

https://i.gyazo.com/31802a3b3ad06e15bf43bbb4532913de.png
